message: Let's be fair and reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I understand you want a larger share, so I'm proposing a compromise to reach an agreement quickly. This offer considers the time pressure we both face.
I see you're willing to compromise, let's meet closer to the middle, considering the time pressure mostly affects you.
Time is slipping away, and we both lose if this fails. I'm offering a significant move towards a 50/50 split to demonstrate my commitment to a fair deal. Let's close this out.
I see you're getting closer to a reasonable split, but considering the inflation is affecting you more, I think this is a fair adjustment.
